description:
This man is the first of many guys playing a game with http://anidb.net/ch15911 [Amano Ai] on the street: Ai offers each of them to purchase a stuffed animal for 500 yen and then earn a kiss from her if they manage to win a jan-ken-pon against her.
Being a http://anidb.net/ch26715 [Video Girl] with the special ability of reading the minds of men, Ai of course wins every time.
name: Otoko A
